医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
FDA 批准的 TIVDAK®：针对宫颈癌的组织因子2024年4月29日，美国FDA完全批准Seagen Inc.的TIVDAK®（tisotumab vedotin）靶向组织因子（TF），用于治疗化疗期间或化疗后病情进展的复发或转移性宫颈癌患者。这标志着宫颈癌治疗领域的重大进步，凸显了抗体药物偶联物 (ADC) 在肿瘤学中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/FDA-approved-TIVDAKc2ae-Targeting-tissue-factor-in-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/FDA-approved-TIVDAKc2ae-Targeting-tissue-factor-in-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9b3014e-8a8a-4807-8921-9aff2ed1f1ed Fri, 10 May 2024 07:51:00 -0400 FDA-approved TIVDAK®: Targeting tissue factor in cervical cancer
世卫组织发布具有里程碑意义的预防导管相关感染指南世界卫生组织发布了第一份全球指南，以防止在医疗手术期间使用放置在小血管中的导管引起的血流和其他感染的发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/WHO-issues-landmark-guidelines-for-preventing-catheter-linked-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/WHO-issues-landmark-guidelines-for-preventing-catheter-linked-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c0eae82-1341-43f8-a4b0-ad61d1fef876 Fri, 10 May 2024 07:36:27 -0400 WHO issues landmark guidelines for preventing catheter-associated infections
研究发现“完美”的压力会对父母和孩子产生不健康的影响如何帮助父母避免和管理倦怠？俄亥俄州立大学的专家齐聚一堂，设计了一项关于父母倦怠触发因素的研究，并在网上发布的报告中报告了他们的调查结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-finds-Pressure-to-be-e2809cperfecte2809d-leads-to-unhealthy-impacts-on-both-parents-and-their-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-finds-Pressure-to-be-e2809cperfecte2809d-leads-to-unhealthy-impacts-on-both-parents-and-their-children.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03469efc-cc8e-4697-9726-a31fc5924175 Fri, 10 May 2024 07:35:00 -0400 Study finds pressure to be “perfect” leads to unhealthy impacts on both parents and their children
他们的第一个孩子带着医疗债务而来。这些伊利诺伊州的父母不会再有第二个孩子了。希瑟·克里维拉尔 (Heather Crivilare) 被送往手术室进行紧急剖腹产时，距离预产期还有一个月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Their-first-baby-came-with-medical-debt-These-Illinois-parents-wone28099t-have-another.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Their-first-baby-came-with-medical-debt-These-Illinois-parents-wone28099t-have-another.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c1b1070-2437-4a31-9972-e4e14e3fe2ea Fri, 10 May 2024 07:21:38 -0400 Their first baby came with medical debt. These Illinois parents won’t have another.
民主党人寻求让共和党为生殖权利的威胁付出代价民主党人卢卡斯·昆斯 (Lucas Kunce) 正试图将生殖保健限制强加于密苏里州共和党参议员乔什·霍利 (Josh Hawley)，他认为这将增加他在 11 月推翻现任议员的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Democrats-seek-to-make-GOP-pay-for-threats-to-reproductive-rights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Democrats-seek-to-make-GOP-pay-for-threats-to-reproductive-rights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce12b80f-7745-4144-a722-adc6f79aac55 Fri, 10 May 2024 07:14:58 -0400 Democrats seek to make GOP pay for threats to reproductive rights
生活在洪水多发地区会增加死亡风险吗？洪水对死亡率的长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Can-living-in-flood-prone-areas-increase-your-risk-of-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Can-living-in-flood-prone-areas-increase-your-risk-of-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0324c805-2140-4204-aaa1-fd2495d3f871 Fri, 10 May 2024 07:12:00 -0400 Can living in flood-prone areas increase your risk of death?

AI模型识别电子烟油中500多种有毒化学物质，揭示电子烟的隐患评估电子烟液的潜在健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/AI-model-identizes-over-500-token-chemicals-in-e-liquids-revealing-vapinge28099s-hidden-dangers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/AI-model-identizes-over-500-token-chemicals-in-e-liquids-revealing-vapinge28099s-hidden-dangers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3abccc9d-41cb-418f-8ff6-1bd81592fe5c Fri, 10 May 2024 06:05:00 -0400 AI model identifies over 500 toxic chemicals in e-liquids, revealing vaping’s hidden dangers
补充维生素 D3 能否降低 COVID-19 的严重程度？补充维生素 D3 在减少重症监护病房入院率方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Can-vitamin-D3-supplementation-reduce-COVID-19-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Can-vitamin-D3-supplementation-reduce-COVID-19-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fe81ff2-74f3-43dd-8e8f-79cbffab97ed Fri, 10 May 2024 04:55:00 -0400 Can vitamin D3 supplementation reduce COVID-19 severity?
令人惊讶的研究表明城市化可能会降低全球传染病风险一项全面的荟萃分析表明，生物多样性丧失、气候变化和化学污染显着增加了全球传染病风险，而城市化可能会降低风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Surprising-study-suggests-urbanization-might-reduce-global-infectious-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Surprising-study-suggests-urbanization-might-reduce-global-infectious-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f33ddb65-bc0b-4446-bb55-48cd4e449b94 Fri, 10 May 2024 00:08:00 -0400 Surprising study suggests urbanization might reduce global infectious disease risk
